actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to specify the amount of Federal funds that may be expended for intake facilities for the benefit of Lonoke and White Counties, Arkansas, as part of the project for flood control, Greers Ferry Lake, Arkansas.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Amends the Miscellaneous Appropriations Act, 2001 to set a $6 million limit on the total amount of Federal funds that may be expended to construct intake facilities for the benefit of Lonoke and White Counties, Arkansas, as part of the flood control project for Greers Ferry Lake.

titles.title: A bill to specify the amount of Federal funds that may be expended for intake facilities for the benefit of Lonoke and White Counties, Arkansas, as part of the project for flood control, Greers Ferry Lake, Arkansas.
